pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: A green train is traveling on a multi-lane road in an urban area with tall buildings and streetlights. The train continues to move forward, passing by various buildings and streetlights. As the train approaches a pier, a hand appears from the right side of the screen and grabs the top of the train. The hand pulls the train off the track, causing it to tilt and fall off the edge.
